projects.name: Maestro
projects.description: Maestro platform self-improvement - autonomous analysis and enhancement of the Maestro system itself

tasks.title: Analyze user feedback
tasks.description: Review and summarize recent user feedback for product improvements
tasks.ai_prompt: Review and summarize the following user feedback into key themes and actionable insights for product improvement

tasks.title: Create landing page mockup
tasks.description: Design a new landing page mockup with the latest brand guidelines
tasks.ai_prompt: Create a detailed design proposal for a new landing page that incorporates our brand colors, modern layout principles, and highlights key product features

tasks.title: Optimize database queries
tasks.description: Review and optimize slow database queries
tasks.ai_prompt: Analyze the following database queries and provide recommendations for optimization, including index suggestions and query rewrites

tasks.title: Analyze Maestro codebase for improvement opportunities
tasks.description:
Perform comprehensive analysis of the Maestro platform codebase to identify:
- Code quality issues (patterns, anti-patterns, technical debt)
- Performance optimization opportunities
- User experience improvements
- Architecture enhancements
- Security vulnerabilities
- Missing features that would improve the platform

Focus on actionable improvements that make Maestro better at managing AI agents and orchestrating autonomous development.

tasks.title: Add request caching to API routes
tasks.description:
Implement request caching to reduce redundant API calls and improve performance.

**Rationale:**
Current API routes make fresh calls for every request, even when data hasn't changed. This increases latency and API costs.

**Implementation:**
1. Add cache layer using in-memory store
2. Implement cache invalidation on data updates
3. Add cache headers to responses
4. Monitor cache hit rates

**Expected Impact:**
- 40-60% reduction in API response time
- Lower infrastructure costs
- Better user experience
